sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The gnome-session package contains gnome-session, session utilities and manager proxy.

sect3.title: gnome-session
sect3.para: gnome-session starts up the GNOME desktop.

sect3.title: session utilities
sect3.para: session utilities includes a configuration program and other session management related utilities.

sect3.title: manager proxy
sect3.para: manager proxy handles basic session management for applications that do not support XSM.
